Job.Description: She will prepare for her coming battles, healing and gathering strength.

Message.Name: full-health
Message.Text: ${name} is fully healed and rested, so she decides to relax.

Message.Name: healing-near-death
Message.Text: ${name}'s health is in critical condition. She's feverish, going in and out of consciousness. You should have a Medic looking after her.

Message.Name: healing-low-health
Message.Text: ${name} is bruised and battered from her previous fights. She spends the entire ${shift} in bed.

Message.Name: healing-mid-health
Message.Text: ${name} still has some scrapes and bruises from previous fights. She spends most of her time recovering, and doing light physical therapy to ensure a successful healing process.

Message.Name: resting-very-tired
Message.Text: ${name} is exhausted due to her previous fights. She spends the entire ${shift} resting in bed.

Message.Name: resting-tired
Message.Text: ${name} is tired because of her previous fights. She spends most of the ${shift} resting, and does some light physical exercises.

Message.Name: meditate
Message.Text: ${name} spends the day meditating and doing light physical exercise to prepare for her next fight.

Message.Name: medics-help
Message.Text: The administrations of your Medics help her to recover faster.
